Please reach out to these resources if you or someone you know is in crisis. It's important to prioritize safety and well-being.

In this post, the speaker is attributing their lack of appetite for the prepped meals to their own perceived flaw (i.e., having no taste buds). This is an example of an internal attributional style because the speaker is blaming their own characteristics (in this case, a lack of taste buds) for their behavior rather than external factors.
